reviewText: i was looking for the old sunday drive-in movie types and picked up this movie because it had shaolin in it's title. i do not recommend it. i definitely recomend the five deadly venoms and the return of the five deadly venoms; as well as the drunken master with jackie chan. the venom movies are classic sunday drive-in movies and the drunken master is recent.

Like the mixture of the supernatural with the kung-fu aspect. Story seemed to veer off at.times, but it was enjoyable to watch. Action and fighting were nicely done. For this to be an older film streamed the sound, and streaming qualities were excellent.
Review of the streaming version. Picture quality good, subtitles remastered, and decent English dubbed soundtrack. The action is okay and picks up at the end with a massive fight.
I enjoyed the ongoing action and adventure!!!
I give it a C-.  Not memorable.
